layout.name: animateState
layout.title: Animate a state by #
layout.tooltip: The main staple for an actor NPC. Initially behaves and animates in a set of a state. Here are the following states it can express: 0 idle forward, 1 hold, 2 point, 3 scratch head, 4 walk, 5 open arms forward, 6 idle front, 7 open arms front

layout.name: talk
layout.title: Talk animate?
layout.tooltip: Draws an animation of an actor speaking. However the following states will not animate this: 2 point
